movie.title: Fishtales 2
movie.description_intro: When Fifi and her best friend Lily the whale get lost during a field trip to visit a sunken treasure ship, they embark on a incredible adventure to return home and reunite a lost sting ray with her parents.
movie.description_full: When Fifi and her best friend Lily the whale get lost during a field trip to visit a sunken treasure ship, they embark on a incredible adventure to return home and reunite a lost sting ray with her parents.

movies.title: In the Aftermath
movies.summary: In the distant future, the Earth was devastated by a massive nuclear catastrophe. Many years have passed, but the air is still polluted, there is very little water, and the sole survivors are severely deformed by radiation and chemical pollution. Their future seems hopeless in this ruined no-man's-land. Until a mysterious angel decides to help the survivors. A girl with a huge egg appears from nowhere. On her journey through the ruins, she decides to be accompanied by a mysterious soldier... Will he prove worthy to be given a magic egg that can save the world?

movies.title: Bigfoot vs the Illuminati
movies.summary: Earth year 4044: advanced AI robots have drained the Earth of its natural resources, leaving the planet a barren shell. A rebel human alliance adrift in space with no planet to call home, calls on the infamous monster-slayer Van Helsing and his co-pilot Bigfoot to do battle with humanity's greatest enemies, the Illuminati.

movies.title: Quest for Camelot
movies.summary: During the times of King Arthur, the story of an adventurous brave girl, named Kayley, whose father, a Knight of the Round Table, is killed by Sir Ruber, a maniacal brute who steals Excalibur and ultimately threatens to seize King Arthur's Camelot. Kayley enlists the blind, reclusive knight-aspirant Garrett and a goofy two headed dragon to brave the Enchanted Forest and retrieve the magic sword. Their adventure is also, of course, fraught with danger.

movies.title: Godzilla: The Planet Eater
movies.summary: Humanity, their alien allies, and Godzilla all enter their endgame as the powerful destructive entity known as Ghidorah arrives on Earth.
